phrases: I will say this once, so listen carefully.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
It was with boy I have liked since spring...
As if it were a miracle...
Yano cast a spell on me.
I did not get a wink of sleep.
What am I going to do about my face?
That thing went pretty well the other day, do not you think?
It is... it is no good...
I might not be able to look him straight in the face anymore...
Hey, take a look at this.
Is it true that you and Yano kissed?
So, what is going on now?
Are you two going to go out?
Sorry, but you would better not come to me with your love problems anymore!
Though I will definitely support you when you are breaking up, so come to me for that!
We will be dating, will not we?
Yano has not said anything to me yet...
And I have not gotten any text messages...
But he never sent me any text messages before, either.
He is slowly starting to get on my nerves.
Umm... they said that thing will be on Saturday.
You seem a little out of it today.
I-It is because I could not get to sleep last night!
I am such a moron for not being able to fall asleep over a kiss!
And what was he talking about?
He is reminding me about upcoming events?
Today, a student council meeting at three.
Thursday, a student council event review meeting.
Today, a student council meeting at three.
Today, a student council meeting at three.
Today, a student council meeting at three.
Geez... what is up with him?
My heart has not stopped pounding since this morning...
Do not give me that cute smile!
Now that I feel so relieved, my sleepiness has caught up with me...
Yano finally smiled at me today.
It means it was not a fake.
I was not taking it the wrong way.
Did not she sleep at all last night?
The student council meeting's at three!
What am I going to do...?
I went to the student council meeting in your place.
I took notes for you, too.
You need to take survey during homeroom, and this is to be submitted next week.
That is what I have been saying.
Yano, a guy who finds everything a pain and skips out all the time, did this?
Can you make it to the movie?
After watching the movie and getting something to drink, I wonder if we will go out to eat, too...
And I cannot forget bus fare, either...
I will pay you back tomorrow, okay?
Actually, I think I will stand.
It is going to get more crowded, you know.
I feel like I am wearing myself out...
I need to act natural... natural...
What do you want to drink?
Looks like there are a lot of open seats.
I should have asked for a milk tea...
I am pushing myself too hard again...
I did not know you liked movies, Yano.
Especially because it is so dark, if you know what I mean!
You do not get it, do you?
Mind if I rest my arm here?
Takahashi, you can also rest your arm here if you need to.
The movie was about a woman who kept passing by the one she loved without realizing it...
Hurry and let them meet each other!
They were finally able to meet again...
He... kept half of the armrest free the entire time...
And that is when I thought...
Moving straight to our topic of the day...
What is up with Nanami kissing him?!
It makes me want to cry!
In the first place, when... when did Nanami fall for Yano, anyway?!
I will never listen to her love problems ever again!
But we cannot just leave Nanami alone, can we?
Please enjoy the second half of the show!
That movie was really good, huh?
What scenes did you like, Yano?
I wonder if it is because I got so whirled up today...
Yano just seems different than normal.
They way he speaks, and his behavior...
They are all different than normal.
I would feel bad if I made you go out of your way today.
Let us go home after we finish eating.
Why are you being so kind?
I am a kind person, under everything.
T-That is not what I meant.
Up until the other day, you were mean to me all the time...
So why did you suddenly become such different person?
Before you told me you loved me, did you not love me?
You are the one who is changed.
Obviously, my girlfriend is not the same as my other classmates.
To me, you are the one who is become different from before.
This basically means that you are an insider in my circle.
Everyone else is split into insiders and outsiders, right?
What am I going to do...?
I have never been with anyone special for this event before...
But the problem here is that Yano has a better sense for this sort of stuff than me...
I have to be careful so he does not say something like laaame to what I get him.
I wonder what sort of things make boys happy?
Even though he does not have anything to say, Yano unexpectedly comes really close sometimes.
But only when no one's around.
He is just like a cat.
Is there anything you want for Christmas?
I would like you to answer seriously.
Soy sauce tastes best with it!
No, it is definitely Worcester sauce!
And just when I thought they were not getting along.
I keep telling you, it is all about the soy sauce!
I am going to the bathroom.
What were you two arguing about?
Oh, which is better on sunny-side up eggs, soy sauce or Worcester sauce.
We must seem like stupid love birds...
No matter what anyone says, soy sauce will remain on top!
I did not think you could be such a doofus.
You are unexpectedly childish, are not you?
Let us go get some pizza.
Geez, how do you have so much money?
You do not even have a part-time job.
My parents give me whatever I ask for.
My parents are really stingy, and they will not even give me allowance.
I bum money off them by doing the whole filial piety thing.
That is why... whenever I touch it, my heart let us out a small squeal of joy.
Why is your hand so cold?
Girls are more sensitive to the cold.
Yano, what do you want for your present?
Ah, and this time, excluding living things.
I do not really need anything.
Yano must have realized that I only have a small allowance...
He is really watching out for me...
I want to give him something.
Just as long as you are there, Takahashi.
It was just so embarrassing to say.
Ah... there is such bad taste in my mouth now!
But my heart is warm and cozy!
And I kind of feel like I have become prettier!
Could it be because of love?
Talk about bad taste in girls!
She is so ugly, so why did he...?
They are just jealous, so do not take it to heart.
I guess I am now in a position where people are jealous of me...
So, what do you want for your Christmas present?
Ugly girls are more... impressive with their looks, to put it a certain way.
What did you find attractive about me, Yano?
Why do I sometimes get anxious like this?
When Yano touches me with his warm hands, my heart clenches up...
I have decided on what I want for a Christmas present.
Promise me that you will never leave my side.
That you will never ever betray me.
I thought I would never be able to go out with anyone again.
Do you really, really like someone like me?
I will not ever feel sympathy for her.
I first learned what that meant... during the winter when I was fifteen years old.
Watashi hitori ja kokoro ga yuretara
Konna ni mo konna ni mo
Dakedo i am about to wa anata no te wa
Koko ni ite sono te de
Itsumo hitori de aruiteru michi ha
The first time you gave me
to overflow in the palm of my hand.
it seems like everyone would vanish.
But you still stretched out your
arm and hand to me, just a little bit.
The path I always walk alone
is too wide, and only makes me lonely.
If we walked together, I would be filled
with happiness, and that would be just fine.
I want to be smiling too.
You sisters, both older and younger, are the worst.
Do not... group me with her...
